definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
vowel harmony (in phonetics of Altaic languages)

sentences.english: The antagonism of moralities is an important factor to influence world harmony.
sentences.chinese: 道德的對立是影響世界和諧的重要因素。

sentences.english: On the palate it is harmonious with a delicious sweetness and well balance acidity.
sentences.chinese: 酒體平衡，美味的甜度和酸度的和諧而統一。

sentences.english: In order to construct harmonious society, it is necessary to try to decrease the recidivism rate.
sentences.chinese: 建設和諧社會，儘量降低重新犯罪率是必要的。

sentences.english: The cosmos has solemn order and orbicular harmony.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙具有嚴整的秩序，圓滿的和諧。

sentences.english: A harmonious wine with a long, fruity and spicyfinish.
sentences.chinese: 回味和諧悠長，餘留果味和辛香。

sentences.english: The Kennedy family occupies, for the moment, a place of equilibrium and purity.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪家族目前正掌控着一個和諧而純潔的領域。

sentences.english: They chose to include all of these dissonant voices together.
sentences.chinese: 他們把那些不和諧的聲音也放在了裏面。

sentences.english: We sincerely hope that Thailand enjoys social harmony, economic development as well as prosperity and peace.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝願泰國社會和諧，經濟發展，國泰民安。

sentences.english: The love which my parents gave me , or the lovely family I am having.
sentences.chinese: 父母從小對我無私的痛愛，他們的和諧家庭氛圍。

sentences.english: I hope someday dogs will be in great harmony with human-beings.
sentences.chinese: 我希望有一天狗能與人類和諧共處。

sentences.english: Use colours found in key photos or graphics on your web page for added harmony.
sentences.chinese: 用顏色或圖形找到關鍵照片你網頁續和諧。

sentences.english: Don't stir up area discrimination, or it'll trigger many disharmonious sounds.
sentences.chinese: 不要搞出地域歧視來，否則會激起很多不和諧的聲音。

sentences.english: The case middle is harmoniously extended by the lugs.
sentences.chinese: 錶殼中段凸耳銷和諧的延伸出來。

sentences.english: It is Huiying's unremitting pursuit to construct a harmonious and coexistent atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 構建和諧共處的企業氛圍是匯英人不懈的追求。

sentences.english: Professionalizing social work is needed to build harmonic community in Henan.
sentences.chinese: 河南省社會工作職業化是構建和諧河南的需要。

sentences.english: Third chapter is the new democracy society harmonious theory of history ponder.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是新民主主義社會和諧的歷史思考。

definition: relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
variant of 關係|关系[guan1 xi5]
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
to be in contact (with sb)/to associate/to interact/to get along (well, poorly)
